sentences.english: Try to drink plenty of water or electrolyte fluids to get rid of stomach virus.
sentences.chinese: 为了消除肠胃感染病毒，要喝大量的水或电解质液体。

sentences.english: Drinking ginger tea will help start a bowel movement.
sentences.chinese: 喝姜茶有助于促进肠胃蠕动。

sentences.english: Symptoms include fever and muscle aches, often with other gastrointestinal symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 病症包括发烧和肌肉疼痛，常伴有其他肠胃病的症状。

sentences.english: Probably flatulence ignited by someones cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 也许是某人的香烟点燃的肠胃气胀。

sentences.english: Her guts were full of writhing snakes biting at her bowels.
sentences.chinese: 她的内脏中仿佛爬满了毒蛇，扭曲着咬着肠胃。

sentences.english: The goal of treatment of flatulence is to reduce gas and odor.
sentences.chinese: 的目标，治疗肠胃气胀是减少气体和气味。

sentences.english: Take some purgative and it will help you purge your bowels of bad matter.
sentences.chinese: 吃点泻药有助于你将肠胃中的有害物质除去。

sentences.english: Having problems with his digestive system recently, he decides to take a barium meal.
sentences.chinese: 最近感觉肠胃不适，他决定去做一次钡餐。

sentences.english: The work appears in the journal Gastroenterology.
sentences.chinese: 此研究结果发布在《肠胃病学》期刊上。
冰淇淋实际上是低肠胃的。

sentences.english: Toxins produced can also be devastating to the cells that line the wall of the gastrointestinal tract.
sentences.chinese: 它们所制造的毒素也会全部弥漫于肠胃壁的细胞间。

sentences.english: What medicine does gastroenteritis eat to you can be controlled?
sentences.chinese: 肠胃炎吃什么药能控制？

sentences.english: Also, people tend to eat dirt when they’re suffering from gastrointestinal distress.
sentences.chinese: 另外，忍受着肠胃不适之苦的人往往也会吃点土。

sentences.english: Aloe vera can also be ingested to help heal chronic problems in the stomach or intestines .
sentences.chinese: 芦荟汁也可以被摄取来帮助疗愈慢性肠胃问题。

sentences.english: The study was published in the July Gastroenterology.
sentences.chinese: 这项调查发表在四月的《肠胃病学》期刊上。

sentences.english: Through the point of drill rules, there are spleen and stomach, regulating gastrointestinal function.
sentences.chinese: 通过点操法，有健脾和胃，调节肠胃功能的作用。

definition: spleen and stomach (digestive organs in TCM)/preferences/one's taste (e.g. in literature)
(of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
